javadoc: HoverService provides the ability to popup data Windows over a Field viewer in response to the mouse hovering over a single Field.

If this service's window supports scrolling, scroll by the specified amount.
@param amount the amount to scroll
methods.name: scroll
methods.comment: If this service's window supports scrolling, scroll by the specified amount.

methods.name: getHoverComponent
methods.comment:
Returns a component to be shown in a popup window that is relevant to the given parameters.
 Null is returned if there is no appropriate information to display.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program that is being hovered over.

params.name: programLocation
params.comment: the program location where the mouse is hovering.

params.name: fieldLocation
params.comment: the precise mouse location within the field viewer

params.name: field
params.comment: the field over which the mouse is hovering

return.comment: The component to be shown for the given location information.
